DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To develop real time national clinical database support share best practice , 1 . To generate hypothesis future clinical research 2 . To understand AMEVIVE use routine clinical practice/real world set . Each patient visit include follow observational endpoint : 1 . AMEVIVE dose 2 . Number course 3 . Concomitant treatment 4 . Response treatment ( patient physician global assessment ) 5 . Status psoriasis-related medical condition 6 . Time re-treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Amevive Wisdom Acquired From Real-Time Evidence ( A.W.A.R.E™ ) Program
DOC.criteria: Amevive clinically indicate patient Amevive contraindicate patient
